House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04594
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING A COMPREHENSIVE NATIONAL GRASSROOTS SPORTS DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM CENTERED IN THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL GAMES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TORRES-GOMEZ, LUCY
DATE FILED : 2019-09-13
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Barba (000 2020-03-11)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-03-04
          -HB No. 4594 was referred to the Subcommittee on Sports chaired by Rep. Alberto "Bobby" D. Pacquiao. The Chairman directed the Committee Secretary to prepare a working draft for the use of the subcommittee, incorporating all the comments, issues and suggestions raised by concerned agencies
          -Initial deliberation
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-09-17
